data.event: The Biu kingdom became established around 1670 in the reign of Mari Watila Tampta.
In 1878 Mari Biya, became the first Bura king to rule from Biu.
The emir's palace is now situated in the town.
With British rule, Biu division was created in 1918.

event.title: was acknowledged as the first emir of Biu in 1920

data.event: Mai Ari Dogo was acknowledged as the first emir of Biu in 1920.

event.title: known as the Biu federation after 1957

data.event: The area became known as the Biu federation after 1957, when the districts of Shani and Askira were added to the emirate.
Maidalla Mustafa dan Muhammad (b. 1915) became Mai Biu, also styled Kuthli, in 1959.
